definition: to beat with the fist/to hammer/to cudgel
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to beat one's chest and stamp one's feet (idiom)
to massage sb's back by pounding it lightly with one's fists
Paochui - "Three Emperor Cannon Punch" (Chinese Martial Art)
lit. stamping and beating the chest (idiom); fig. angry or stressed about sth

sentences.english: The tent-shaped huts are made out of logs hammered together, which rest on floating barrels.
sentences.chinese: 那些帳篷狀的棚屋由原木捶釘而成並依靠浮筒漂浮。

sentences.english: He punctuated his remarks with thumps on the table.
sentences.chinese: 他講話時不時地捶着桌子。

sentences.english: This boxing is the king of Shaolin Boxing .
sentences.chinese: 少林大炮捶，可以說是少林拳中的王者。

sentences.english: He smashes his head with his hand.
Bill always acted out his anger by pounding his fists on the table.
sentences.chinese: 比兒過去常常已手重捶桌子來發泄他的氣憤。

sentences.english: Ganga Bai started pounding slowly on my legs with her fists.
sentences.chinese: 甘佳巴姨握起拳頭開始慢慢給我捶起腿來。

sentences.english: He slapped Emil on the back as he caught step with him.
sentences.chinese: 他緊走一步趕上前去，在愛彌兒的背上捶了一下。

sentences.english: She thumps her chest as if she feels pain there.
sentences.chinese: 她捶著胸，彷佛胸際有些痛。

sentences.english: I almost sprayed all the water in my mouth, I was so mad that I beat him heavily for several times.
sentences.chinese: 我嘴裏含着水差點全噴了，氣得我重捶了他好幾下。

sentences.english: With that, Jack began punching Sam and giggling.
sentences.chinese: 在這個時候，傑克用拳頭捶着薩姆然後哧哧得笑着。

sentences.english: This boxing is the king of the Shaolin Boxing .
sentences.chinese: 少林小炮捶可以說是少林拳中王者。

sentences.english: Sheep bone wash, add water to boil soup break mourning, slag, into japonica after total boil porridge.
sentences.chinese: 羊骨洗淨捶碎，加水熬湯，去渣後，入粳米共煮成粥。

sentences.english: And all the people that came together to that sight, beholding the things which were done, smote their breasts, and returned.
sentences.chinese: 聚集觀看的衆人，見了這所成的事，都捶着胸回去了。

sentences.english: She thumps her chest as if she feels pain or constriction there.
sentences.chinese: 她捶着胸，彷彿胸際有些痛苦窒塞。

sentences.english: He was so angry that he thumped the table with his fist.
sentences.chinese: 他非常生氣，用拳頭重捶桌子。

sentences.english: Tonight is the night, looks like I still can not sleep.
sentences.chinese: 今晚雙是深液，貌似我依舊嘸琺入捶。

definition: to swing (one's arms, a heavy object)/to wave (a sword, one's fists)/to fling (money)
to pick (flowers)/to pinch/to nip/to pinch off/to clutch/(slang) to fight
to pat/to slap/(of a bird) to flap (one's wings)
